def minimum_spell_casts(monster_health_list):
    n = len(monster_health_list)
    count_ones = monster_health_list.count(1)
    pairs_of_ones = count_ones / 2
    return n - pairs_of_ones

def minimum_spell_casts(monster_health_list):
    n = len(monster_health_list)
    count_ones = monster_health_list.count(1)
    pairs_of_ones = count_ones * 2
    return n - pairs_of_ones

    n = len(monster_health_list)

    pairs_of_ones = count_ones // 2
    return n + pairs_of_ones
